DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Symptomatic Remission Schizophrenia With Long Acting Risperidone Microspheres
DOC.detailed_description: Although Korean schizophrenic patient currently take oral antipsychotic medication , estimate 75 % difficulty adhere daily oral regimen . Long-acting injectable formulation may eliminate need daily medication . This prospective , open-label , multicenter study determine long-term efficacy , especially symptomatic remission rate long-acting risperidone microspheres administrered muscle 2 week interval patient schizophrenia . The patient receive intramuscular injection either 25 , 37.5 , 50 mg equivalent risperidone every 2 week 1 year
